```{r cleanup, include = FALSE}
unlink(".drake", recursive = TRUE)
```

```{r plan-base-vis, include = FALSE}
library(drake)
library(tidyverse)
create_plot <- function(data) {
  ggplot(data, aes(x = Petal.Width, fill = Species)) +
    geom_histogram()
}

plan <- drake_plan(
  raw_data = readxl::read_xlsx(file_in("raw-data.xlsx")),

  data = mutate(raw_data, Species = forcats::fct_inorder(Species)),
  
  hist = create_plot(data),
  
  model = lm(Sepal.Width ~ Petal.Width + Species, data)
)
```

```{r vis-intro, echo = FALSE}
config <- drake_config(plan, verbose = FALSE)
vis_drake_graph(
  config,
  from = file_store("raw-data.xlsx"), mode = "out",
  build_times = "none", ncol_legend = 0,
  width = "100%"
)
```

```{r plan-base}
library(drake)
library(tidyverse)

create_plot <- function(data) {
  ggplot(data, aes(x = Petal.Width, fill = Species)) +
    geom_histogram()
}

plan <- drake_plan(
  raw_data = readxl::read_xlsx(file_in("raw-data.xlsx")),

  data = raw_data %>%
    mutate(Species = forcats::fct_inorder(Species)),
  
  hist = create_plot(data),
  
  model = lm(Sepal.Width ~ Petal.Width + Species, data)
)

plan
```

)

```{r better-plan}
create_plot <- function(data) {
  ggplot(data, aes(x = Petal.Width, fill = Species)) +
    geom_histogram()
}

plan <- drake_plan(
  raw_data = readxl::read_xlsx(file_in("raw-data.xlsx")),

  data = raw_data %>% 
    mutate(Species = forcats::fct_inorder(Species)) %>%
    select(-X__1), #<<
  
  hist = create_plot(data),
  
  model = lm(Sepal.Width ~ Petal.Width + Species, data)
)
```
